text: The Tavern Keeper's Daughter is a 1908 American silent action movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Tavern-Keeper’s DaughterThe Tavern Keeper’s Daughter and stars George Gebhardt, Edward Dillon, and Florence Auer. ==Actors== * George Gebhardt as Mexican * Edward Dillon as Father * Florence Auer as Mother * Marion Leonard as Daughter * Harry Solter as Old Man * Marion Sunshine ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:1900s action movies Category:American action movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Tavern Keeper's Daughter
